<center>![](https://www.xhostfire.com/images/logow.png)</center>

We have a new XMAS Offer available in our South Korea location.

**Server-specific features:**

KVM Virtualisation
Enterprise grade hardware (Intel E5/E3) with RAID 10.
Control panel management - You have the option to reinstall and perform a variety of power functions straight from the panel.
Setup - usually instant if payment was confirmed successfully.

**Seoul, South Korea Location**

vCPU - 1 core (E5)
RAM - 768 MB DDR3
Storage - 10GB RAID 10 (SSD)
Traffic - 900GB @ 1Gbps.
ISP - KT (Seoul, Korea Telecom)

PRICE: $7/month
Order link: https://www.xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=133

**Oslo, Norway Location**

vCPU: 1 core (E3)
RAM: 1GB DDR4
Storage: 15GB RAID 10 Protected.
Clean Traffic: 1TB per month
Virtualisation: KVM
New price: $84/year with coupon: NOLEBVM
Order Link: https://www.xhostfire.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=25

This is a $60 DISCOUNT (voucher to be used as coupon), originally $144/year.

**Network:**
ISP South Korea  - KT AS4766
ISP Norway - TDC AS3292

We use our own IP space in Korea.

Thanks!
